targets.expr: system_memory_usage{host_name="$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace=~"$d_namespace", state="used"} / ignoring (state) system_memory_limit{host_name="$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace=~"$d_namespace"} * 100

system_filesystem_usage{host_name="$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace=~"$d_namespace", mountpoint="/", state="used"} / ignoring (state) system_filesystem_limit{host_name="$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace=~"$d_namespace", mountpoint="/"} * 100

system_filesystem_usage{host_name="$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace=~"$d_namespace", mountpoint="/var/log", state="used"} / ignoring (state) system_filesystem_limit{host_name="$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace=~"$d_namespace", mountpoint="/var/log"} * 100
